pages.text: To automate recipes, dispensers have a few new features.
When bowls or bucket inside dispenser, it would try to drain fluid containers in front of it, for automated cooked stew output.
When water bucket or stew bowls inside dispenser, it would try to fill fluid container in front of it, for automated water adding and auto mixing.
When gravy boats inside dispenser and a gravy boat in front of it, it would try to replace gravy boat in the front with the one in its inventory, for automated oil filling.
Also, putting bowl inside dispenser can draw output from frying pans. Putting spice inside dispenser to replace spice in kitchen facilities, while putting flower pot inside withdraw them.
